A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is a horrible film. I’m not even a diehard Star Wars fan but I left the cinemas feeling angry and disappointed. Comedy was injected into serious scenes which only served to cheapen them; there were so many plot threads from TFA which got a half-assed answer; the entire plot was irrelevant and left you thinking what was the point. I’m just gobsmacked with how bad this really was. I could write a better Episode 8 in 5 minutes. By far the worst Star Wars film of the saga. THE WORST... BY FAR.
